summary: My research is focused on using data to accelerate the transition of molecules and materials towards sustainable industrial improvement. My vision is to make automatic algorithms that could self-improve industrial systems, and recommend debottlenecking strategies from fundamental molecules and materials. I am particularly interested in research efforts towards energy systems and industrial sustainability.

awards.issuer: International Conference on Energy, Sustainability and Climate Crisis, Greece

awards.title: Maybank Smart City Banking Hackathon 2018 (2nd Runner-Up)
awards.description: We (Team BRT) proposed a creative idea which integrates banking with smart energy distribution system. With the invention, the problems including unnecessary electric tariff of users due to sudden spike of maximum demand, unsecure profit of TNB, environmental impacts (due to over-relaying of fossil energy) can be effectively resolved. The preliminary evaluation shows the proposed solution will bring substantial ROI (> 20 %) with a reasonable payback period (~4.5 years).

awards.title: Startupbootcamp Fintech Hackathon Finalist 2017
awards.description: Lead a team of 5 consisting of 3 coders, 1 UI/UX designer and 1 tech entrepreneur to participate in the Fintech hackathon. Our solution is a second generation private cryptocurrency platform which integrates social aspects and user convenience within an android based app. The app utilizes peer to peer Near Field Communication(NFC) , Optical Character Recognition (OCR), blockchain technology and InterPlanetary File System (IPFS).

awards.title: JomHack Hackathon Top 10 Finalist
awards.description: Led a team of 3 to participate in an industrial-level coding Hackathon to compete with software engineers and professional consultant companies. Our team utilized the newest LORA technology to enhance the emergency safety system and emergency procedure of processing sites or relevant facilities. The solution was pitched and highly up-voted by external judges and investors, which eventually prevailed to be one of the top 10 solutions within the competition. Complex electrical hardware and software skills were highly utilized within this solution.

awards.title: UNMC Chem-E-Car Champion
awards.description: Led a team of four to innovate and construct a shoebox-sized car, which is fueled by chemicals. The design of the car utilizes complex controller programming, chemical kinetics and mechanical design. Precise calibration work was also carried out for floor of different friction factor, which eventually led to our team winning the championship.
awards.issuer: The University of Nottingham Malaysia Campus, IEM

awards.title: Australian Mathematics Competition High Distinction
awards.description: I participated in the international mathematics competition hosted by the Australian Mathematics Trust and was awarded high distinction. This award is given to the top 2% of the participants in the world. I developed good logic thinking skills and analytical skills during the preparation of this competition.

company.name: NETME Centre, Brno University of Technology

profile_positions.company: NETME Centre, Brno University of Technology
profile_positions.description:
Worked in Laboratory of Energy-Intensive Processes (LENP), in NETME Center. NETME Center is an EU-funded modern Industry 4.0 research infrastructure that is located in Technology Park, Brno under the Brno University of Technology. Brno Technology Park is aimed to create a first-class research location in central Europe, the vision is to create a safe Silicon Valley in the heart of Europe. The technology park includes institutes and companies like NETME, CEITEC, AdMaS, IBM, RedHat, Zebra.

Project:
- Funded Project OPVVV PO1 "Strategic Partnership for Environmental Technologies and Energy Production" (Junior Researcher)

NETME Centre:
http://netme.cz/
profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher

profile_positions.description:
Pentas Flora Sdn Bhd is a scheduled waste company that collects spent oil, used plastics, spent solvent and waste paint/ink to be recycled into valuable products. The main refinery uses a state of art technology to convert any form of waste oil into premium fuel oil. The company expertise is in areas of waste handling, waste minimization and waste oil recycling. 

Process Units Handled: Wiped Film Evaporator, Short Path Distillation, Oil Fired Thermic Fluid Heater/Boiler, Flash Tank, Compressor, Centrifugal Pump, Rotary Screw Pump, Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger, Cooling Tower, Vacuum Evaporator, Compressed Air System.

Project Involved:
1. Feasibility Study for the Addition of Shell and Tube Heat Exchanger in Process Line.
2. Asphalt Storage Tank Stability Study, Design and Implementation In Accordance to ASCE, UBC, ASME Standards.
3. In-house P&ID, Isometric Drawing and Tag Numbers Consolidation.
4. Heat Exchanger Insulation, Servicing and Maintenance.
5. Design, Study, Erection and Commissioning of Heat Exchanger Skid, Flash Tank Skid, Vacuum Pump Skid, and Vacuum Evaporator Skid.
6. Sizing and Design of Platform Connection Bridge (Serrated Grating and Checker Plate). 
7. Point of Contact for Process Instrumentation Installation.
8. Design, Sizing, Construction and Implementation of Compressed Air System In Accordance to BCAS and ASME standards.
10. In-house process design improvement and validation
11. Cooling tower study, design and commissioning.
profile_positions.title: Process Engineer

profile_positions.description:
East One-Zero-One is a process engineering consultant company that specializes in oil, gas and petrochemical processing facilities. The company provides design and operation solutions via cutting edge simulation technologies.

Highlights of Internship Training:
1. Steady State and Dynamic Process Simulation in VMGSim, iCON, HYSYS and UniSIM, specializing on upstream oil and gas processes.
2. Validation and Research for In-house Technical Methodologies.
3. Oil and Gas Prototype Software Development.
4. Consolidate and Managing Data for Simulation Basis.
5. Collecting On-site Process Data via PI (Process Information) System.
6. Project Management For On-going Process Design and Operation Projects.
profile_positions.title: Process Simulation Engineer
